attributes.action: Nationalise energy sector to reduce Gas and Electricity prices.
attributes.additional_details: They are in a better position to stop the energy sectors exploitation of the common man.
attributes.background: Gas companies making billions in profit when wholesale prices are down. That is unfair to the public. Nationalise energy companies to control prices.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621719
